DOC.brief_summary: Study evaluates the drug-drug interaction between Ticagrelor and Venlafaxine when taken together in healthy volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Drug-drug Interaction Between Ticagrelor and Venlafaxine When Taken Together in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: a weight of at least 50 kg and a body mass index between 18 to 30 kg/m2 History of clinically significant disease or disorder as judged by the investigator Any clinically significant illness, medical/surgical procedure or trauma within 4 weeks of the first administration of drug. History of haemophilia, von WillebrandÂ´s disease, lupus anticoagulant or other diseases/syndromes that may alter or increase bleeding. History of previous or ongoing psychiatric disease
